page.title: 13 A Beccles Plastics Factory
page.content: Eleven years ago John Maynard and Trevor Harris started M&H Plastics in Common Lane.15 people worked there and printed on bottles made elsewhere.4 years ago they started making bottles of their own for a regular supply.The moulding machines are made in Italy by a company called Magic.M&H make 70 million plastic bottles a year.They cost about 8p each but some may cost up to 26p.The caps cost about 4p.One machine makes 4 caps at a time and can make 20,000 a day.A machine of $25,000 and a computer of $7,000 was making a mould automatically when we saw it. 160 people work shifts 24 hours a day. They change jobs every 2 hours so that they do not get bored. The factory is on a new site on London Rd.with plenty of room for expansion.
